settings.title: MAKING INFERENCES
settings.instructions:
Now it's time for a game! Complete each of the statements to review what you learned in the lesson.
Select "instructions" to toggle this window.

set.choice: A story about a presidents meeting with advisors would be
A story about schools in India would be
A natural disaster in one country could be
set.answer: harmful to the economies and environments and health of other countries around the world.

set.choice: A decision to limit the exports of one country could be
set.answer: frustrating for people in another country who used to buy the products.

set.choice: A choice to declare war in one country could be
set.answer: concerning to another who has ties of friendship to that country and may be required to send troops.

feedback.incorrect:
Incorrect. Here are the correct statements.
A story about a president's meeting with advisors would be domestic and political news.
A story about schools in India would be international and social news.
A natural disaster in one country could be harmful to the economies and environments and health of other countries around the world.
A decision to limit the exports of one country could be frustrating for people in another country who used to buy the products.
A choice to declare war in one country could be concerning to another who has ties of friendship to that country and may be required to send troops.
